showerReviews.reviewText: I‚Äôve never been so disgusted and disappointed in my life. The shower was not even close to being clean it looks like they put towels in there and said to hell with it. The toilet looked like it hadn‚Äôt been cleaned in about a week and the ‚Ä¶

Showers are dirty in certain areas and the showers need to be scrubbed with brush and just not sprayed with certain odor eaters. Really dirty showers in the corners and beside the door in showers and the fans are never wiped down. Things ‚Ä¶
Very bad experienceI waited one hour for shower, shower was empty üëé ‚Ä¶

We were pleased to walk into such a large shower since we are a couple, however, it appears the only thing that was done prior to us entering was the previous users towels were removed. It was large strands of hair on the sink and smaller ‚Ä¶

Real clean and nice Loves. I parked for my overnight reset and ordered a shower via the app and went to check into it when I was notified it was ready and walked in on someone else using it. I told the clerk up front and she said its been a ‚Ä¶

Where can I begin I called in to make sure there were showers available. Was told yes came in paid got my receipt went to the shower to find out someone was in there. Then went back up to the front I stated you all need help when the clerk ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , (i actually thought it must have been recently remodeled) by far. Even the caulking in floors and walks was white and looked new. Room smelled fresh as well. I had Shower 3, and walked into that room saying "wow!". Thank you Ketichia!! ‚Ä¶

This place was beautiful had excellent shower room I had to get my daughter a shower and some clothes and the young lady at the cash register who helped us was awesome she even went all the way to the back to find my daughter's size thank ‚Ä¶
Nice clean lot ample parking not a long wait to get a shower would have given the place five stars but the towels were a little thin in the skin in the shower you need to buy new ones

My husband and I went to this Love's to take a shower and we were attended to by a very polite Coral who offered us clean towels and the bathrooms were clean and organized, we love being in this place‚ù§Ô∏èüá∫üá∏üáßüá∑ ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Lots of spaces, and they have a  McDonalds on site. There is a large, clean store, and the restrooms were clean.

It is a smaller Pilot, but it is really clean and well organized. Easy to get into with our n√ºCamp travel trailer, clean lot, working pumps and card readers, clean restroom with goop-like hand cleanser, and several self checkout kiosks that were actually really easy to use. There‚Äôs a McDonalds attached.

I go to alot of Pilots but I have to say this is by far the most clean and well maintained Pilot I have been to and the staff is very friendly.
The staff takes really good care of this location if your from Pilot Corporate and reading this I just want you to know this location got it right.
Me and my friends went to the bathroom here and when we were leaving the employees yelled at us not to piss in the trash can. I don‚Äôt know who is peeing in your trash can but it isn‚Äôt us
Thanks, staff! Great job. This place is always clean inside and out and always friendly big thanks to the management team for picking the right employees.

Nocatee / Ponte Vedra area.  I don‚Äôt know about you, but I like a clean, private bathroom with plenty of stalls, and pilot seems to have these cross the states.  Also, the gas is less expensive then even gas stations across the street.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Malena Ma Lane Ya Taylor_Nocatee_/_Ponte_Vedra_area._I_don‚Äôt_know_about_yo_4 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Did not see a Popeyes.  Prices are way too high for the  truck drivers.  Parking  for four wheelers. Drivers  showers

showerReviews.reviewText: Right here it‚Äôs a not real TA. Look here shower room. Super clean and new. The most clean TA shower rooms ever. The driver will got nice morning and one night right here . Two minutes walk Dunkin and McDonald . Thanks Lawrence nice clean ‚Ä¶

I came on 02.29.25 at 12.10 pm to get a shower. Tried to book it through the TA app but the app gave me an error and took my shower credit. I went to the fuel desk and Jasmine refused to give me a shower, knowing they had a problem with the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ in comparison... So I pulled in here on Monday afternoon... Slept like a baby because their lot is pretty dark... And then I got up and took a shower on Tuesday (today). $14. It was very clean and it felt oh so good! Employees are all very ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ area, I cannot give them 5*. Way too many paid parking spaces sitting empty when people spending hundreds on fuel would love to be able to log a 30 minute break and go eat or maybe grab a shower. What good are points and showers when you ‚Ä¶

Apparently management wants to save in electricity bills light goes off during a shower and I got a guard at the door when I go out !!!! Do their business go out ??? They act like that marking all parking spots as reserve trying to get ‚Ä¶
This facility as of today has broken shower locks in which the porter didn't think enough to take it outta service for maintenance July 30 2025, 17:07

I come here and I book the shower and am waiting before the last 1 hour and they dont have any shower and also dont have empty waiting chairs we are stand here before 1 hour dont come here and the staffs very unfriendly behavior

I try to get a shower at 1:00 am there was not showers ready the fuel desk lady told me they  work on it cleaning but there was not truckers taking showers at this time , they point is if not Bory taking showers at this time why is a ‚Ä¶

Showers were out of service. If they were under construction or doing remodeling, they should of had at least one or two showers in working order as much money as the drivers pay to park and shower. Terrible service.

‚Ä¶ at this truck stop this morning. They were using the bathroom and found mold on the floors. They could actually smell it. Plus, they found hair on the shower wall.  I'm sorry. Truck drivers deserve better. They do a lot for this country

showerReviews.reviewText: Fairly large place with lots of items for sale.  Bathrooms seemed clean.  Shelves were stocked.

This used to be A great place to stop and get some gas and a donut, 2 years ago it was relatively new, and used to have clean bathrooms but not any more. It is run down and the gas is more $ then right down the street.

I can't agree with many if not the majority of these reviews. The store was nice clean and well kept and none of the staff were rude or unfriendly. I am a truck driver and personally I appreciated how they run the store and keep up their ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: had a great experience. parking doesn't fill up too fast, tons of spots when i got here at around noon. showers were about what you'd expect, clean and well maintained. only issue i had was pump #19 didn't want to work on the app or when i put my card in so i had to go all the way around to try pump #21, which worked.
Brand new Love's. Clean, convenient, priced competitively, easy on/off from the interstate 1 block down. Even has a Hardee's, pet relief area, and waste water pump out station. Highly recommend.

Great customer service and clean facilities. Love stopping here on long trips. We have several children and  safety and cleanliness is always our top priority when deciding to stop.  We have never been disappointed at Love's. 10 of 10 would definitely recommend.
Stopped at Loves across the country. They were all clean, had at least one restaurant inside. Gas pumps were quick, busy inside but did not have to wait long at the register.  Would recommend Loves.
Nice and clean place, but No trailer drop policy INFORCED. This was our 1st time parking there and out trailer got towed. :( No warning just gone.

This Love's has a great feature, having a dog park for the travelers with pets! The dog park was clean and has a separate area for small and big dogs. They provide a poop station (w poop bag and trash can). A water spigot with a dog bowl ‚Ä¶

New Love offers showers, laundry rooms, restrooms, and semi-truck parking. There's a Hardee's inside, with incredibly friendly staff who prepare fresh food. The Love's staff is also very nice and welcoming. I really appreciate how clean and new the truck parking area is, and I hope truckers will help maintain it that way.

Wow! Spotless showers, and kind customer service!
Also shoutout to the truck service/parts team! With Kris and other wonderful mechanic, we were taken care of and good to go safely back on the road. Thank you so much!! You guys are the best!!
